settings.title: Let's partner to create aesthetic spaces together
settings.text: Calling brands, Interior firms to partner with India's first theme based curated marketplace

settings.title: Slide 2
settings.text: Introduce customers to your shop with lifestyle and product imagery

settings.heading: Sell on IKIRU
settings.subheading:
We partner with manufacturers and artisans to list their products on our marketplace.

If you believe your products are: 
- Aesthetically designed
- Crafted with ethically sourced materials
- Matches our home decor themes
- Great quality

We would like to have you onboard with us.
Fill out the form below and join us in our journey to make every Indian home aesthetically pleasing.

settings.heading: Designers & Architects
settings.subheading:
We partner with interior designers, stylists and architects in order to create an open platform for fueling meaningful collaborations and professional partnerships.

We help designers in designing their client’s spaces with our curated theme-based decor collection.

Exclusive collaboration benefits:

- Recognition on our website with your profile page.

- Exciting offers and discounts for designers and their clients 

We would love to have you onboard with us.
Fill out the form below and our team will connect with you super soon.

settings.text: If you got some more ideas to partner with Ikiru, let us know here
